main_definition: A collection of photographs or the action of taking photographs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Plural form of photograph, referring to multiple images captured by a camera.
meanings_and_examples.example: She has thousands of photographs from her travels around the world.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act or process of taking photographs.
meanings_and_examples.example: During our vacation, we enjoyed capturing many memorable moments on film.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collection of photographs typically organized in a specific format such as album pages or digital folders.
meanings_and_examples.example: He compiled all his family photos into an album to create a beautiful photo book.
